name: BuildPriority
description: Dedicated task to change jobs priorities for build and release pipelines
author: Cl√©ment Picq

inputs.name: input_OrganizationUri
inputs.label: Organization URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Complete URI for your Organization (ex: https://dev.azure.com/Fabrikam).

inputs.name: input_BuildId
inputs.label: Build ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build ID or Release deployment ID from which you want to change priority.

inputs.name: input_JobNameList
inputs.label: Job names list
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of job names that will be prioritized, separated with a comma. If no job names are given, all jobs of the build will be prioritized.

inputs.name: input_PoolIdList
inputs.label: Agent Pool IDs list
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of all Agent Pools that need to be investigated, separated with a comma. This value is only for optimization purpose. If no Pool IDs are given, all Agent Pool IDs will be investigated.

inputs.name: input_Depth
inputs.label: Depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: Depth for the search of JobRequests. This value is only for optimization purpose. We will only look for the first {Depth} job request of the Agent Pool.
